description: This file defines a Flutter widget for the Feedback Center Screen targeted at managers within the app. It contains UI elements such as an AppBar, gradient header, placeholder items for feedback list, rating, sentiment, and reply actions, and a styled list item widget.

classes.name: ManagerFeedbackCenterScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget representing the manager's feedback center screen with a header and placeholder list items.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: A stateless widget for displaying individual list items within the feedback center, styled with icons and shadow effects.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI of the ManagerFeedbackCenterScreen, including an app bar, a gradient header, and placeholder list items.

methods.name: _Item.build
methods.description: Builds the UI of each list item, displaying an icon and text within styled container.
